backend/main.mo: Actor with access control managing user profiles, app settings, sermon cache, and latest app release with admin‑protected updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing Ramadan checklist enhancements, persistence, and UI requirements with related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing many frontend files including settings storage, fasting tracker, location, prayer, and weather modules.
frontend/docs/android-webview-template.m: Guide for creating an Android WebView wrapper app with caching, JS bridge, notifications, and alarm handling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH variable color theme for light/dark modes with global resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file loading fonts, metadata, favicon, and the root React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with header, weather summary, update prompt, and tab navigation for all feature tabs.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Placeholder AuthButton component that returns null.
frontend/src/components/MobileTabsNav.ts: Mobile tab navigation defining primary and overflow tabs and rendering corresponding tab content.
frontend/src/components/SelectLocationPr: Card prompting user to choose a location with a button callback for navigation.
frontend/src/components/TabsOverflowMenu: Renders a dropdown menu for overflow tabs, calling onSelectTab when an item is chosen.
Defines AdhkarItem and exports static morning and evening adhkar lists with text, translation, and repetition counts.
frontend/src/features/adhkar/MorningEven: Displays morning and evening adhkar with checkboxes, progress tracking, and reset actions using saved settings.
frontend/src/features/app-release/curren: Exports the current hardcoded app version string.
frontend/src/features/app-release/semver: Implements semantic version comparison and a helper to check if a version is newer.
frontend/src/features/app-release/Update: Shows a dismissible alert when a newer app version is available, linking to the store and remembering dismissals.
frontend/src/features/app-release/update: Provides localStorage helpers to store and retrieve dismissed update prompt versions.
frontend/src/features/app-release/useIsC: React Query hook checking if the current actor has admin privileges.
frontend/src/features/app-release/useLat: Fetches the latest app release metadata via React Query, handling missing or failing backend responses.
frontend/src/features/app-release/useUpd: Mutation hook to update the latest app release and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/features/dua-guide/duaGuide: Tanımlar ve kategorilere göre gruplanmış dua veri listelerini içerir.
frontend/src/features/dua-guide/DuaGuide: Renders a dua guide with category tabs, dua list, and a detail dialog for selected duas.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/Esmaul: Esmaül Hüsna maddelerini renkli kart olarak gösteren ve seçildiğinde detay açan kart bileşeni.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/esmaul: Esmaül Hüsna için id, Arapça, transliterasyon, Türkçe anlam ve dua içeren veri kümesini tanımlar.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/Esmaul: Esmaül Hüsna listesini kartlar halinde gösterir ve seçilen ismin detaylarını dialog içinde sunar.
frontend/src/features/fasting-tracker/Fa: Ramazan, nafile ve kaza oruçlarını ekleme, silme ve hedef belirleme özellikleriyle takip eden ana sekme bileşeni.
frontend/src/features/fasting-tracker/Ra: Ramazan ayındaki 30 günün tamamlanma durumunu gösteren ilerleme, gün listesi ve sıfırlama işlevi sunar.
frontend/src/features/hatim/HatimTakipTa: Implements a Quran reading progress tracker with page navigation, input validation, and saving settings.
frontend/src/features/home/currentPrayer: Determines the current prayer slot by comparing the current time to adjusted prayer times.
frontend/src/features/home/HomeTab.tsx: Renders the home screen showing location selection, next prayer countdown, and prayer times with kerahat integration.
frontend/src/features/home/NextPrayerCou: Displays the upcoming prayer and remaining time, using a countdown hook and handling loading/error states.
frontend/src/features/home/PrayerTimeCar: Shows four prayer-related content cards and opens a dialog with detailed ayet, hadith, dua, or esma content.
frontend/src/features/home/time-content/: Provides a list of dua items with Arabic text, Turkish meaning, and usage context.
Provides a list of hadith items with Arabic text, Turkish translation, and source references.
Defines a VerseItem interface and exports an array of Quran verses with Arabic text, Turkish translation, and references.
frontend/src/features/home/useCurrentPra: React hook that tracks and updates the current prayer slot every minute based on adjusted prayer times.
frontend/src/features/home/useNextPrayer: Provides the next prayer time and a live countdown by calculating remaining minutes until the upcoming prayer.
frontend/src/features/home/usePrayerTime: Selects deterministic random verse, hadith, dua, and esma content per prayer slot using a seeded generator.
frontend/src/features/location/LocationS: UI component for searching, selecting, and saving a user’s location using geocoding results.
frontend/src/features/location/openMeteo: Fetches geocoding results from Open-Meteo API and converts them into internal Location objects.
frontend/src/features/location/types.ts: Defines Location and GeocodingResult TypeScript interfaces for geocoding and location data.
frontend/src/features/location/useGeocod: React Query hook that performs debounced geocoding searches when the input has at least two characters.
frontend/src/features/namaz-ogretici/Nam: Renders namaz tutorial UI with rekat info and gender-specific step-by-step prayer instructions.
frontend/src/features/namaz-ogretici/nam: Provides prayer rakat definitions and detailed men’s and women’s namaz steps with optional Arabic text.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/dista: Utility functions for calculating Haversine distance and formatting it for display.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/Nearb: Search UI for selecting a location using geocoding results, allowing temporary or saved location selection.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/nearb: Fetches nearby mosques from Overpass API, parses results, computes distances, and sorts them.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/Nearb: Main tab showing nearby mosques based on active or temporary location, radius selection, and search integration.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/types: Defines the NearbyMosque interface used for mosque data.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/useNe: React Query hook for fetching and caching nearby mosques based on coordinates and radius.
frontend/src/features/notifications/noti: Defines notification templates for prayers and a formatter to customize bodies with time and lead minutes.
Fetches daily prayer times from the Aladhan API using coordinates.
frontend/src/features/prayer/kerahatTime: Computes kerahat time windows and merges them with prayer times into a sorted list.
frontend/src/features/prayer/PrayerTimes: Displays daily prayer times with offset editing, kerahat windows, and location-based fetching.
Provides functions to shift prayer times by a minute offset and return updated time strings.
frontend/src/features/prayer/usePrayerTi: Fetches prayer times via React Query using location coordinates with caching and retry logic.
frontend/src/features/qibla/QiblaFinderT: UI component for displaying and interacting with the Qibla finder, handling location selection and device orientation.
frontend/src/features/qibla/qiblaMath.ts: Implements great‑circle math to compute Qibla bearing and normalize angles.
frontend/src/features/qibla/useDeviceOri: Custom hook to read device orientation, request permissions, and produce a compass heading.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/fastingBas: Defines static text sections describing fasting basics, rules, and recommendations.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/ramadanMen: Contains a list of 30 Ramadan menus with daily sahur and iftar items.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/RamazanKos: Main Ramadan tab showing prayer times, menus, and educational content with location and offset handling.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/tarawihCon: Static content describing Tarawih prayer details and guidance.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/useDailyRo: Hook that returns a deterministic daily menu and updates automatically at midnight.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/dat: Utility helpers for local day calculations and Turkish date formatting.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/hij: Converts Hijri events to Gregorian dates by scanning a full year using Intl API formatting.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/rel: Static dataset defining all 2026 Islamic days with fixed Gregorian dates and Turkish labels.
Type definitions for Hijri events and computed Gregorian religious day objects.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/Rel: React UI tab showing 2026 Islamic days, highlighting the next upcoming event and listing all days with status badges.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/use: Hook returning the 2026 religious days, determining the next upcoming event and days remaining.
frontend/src/features/sermon/CumaHutbesi: Empty placeholder component file for the Friday sermon tab.
frontend/src/features/sermon/useLatestSe: Empty placeholder hook for fetching the latest sermon.
frontend/src/features/settings/AdminAppR: Admin-only form for updating latest app release version and Play Store URL with validation and success/error UI.
frontend/src/features/settings/appSettin: Type definitions for app settings including location, notifications, fasting, and adhkar tracking.
frontend/src/features/settings/localSett: Local storage manager for settings with versioned migration logic and default notification/prayer settings.
frontend/src/features/settings/SettingsT: Settings UI for adjusting time offset and per-prayer notification lead times, plus admin release section.
frontend/src/features/settings/useAppSet: Manages loading and saving app settings using React Query with local storage fallback.
frontend/src/features/tasbihat/tasbihatD: Provides static tasbihat definitions including Arabic, transliteration, translation, and repetition counts.
frontend/src/features/tasbihat/TasbihatT: Renders a scrollable list of tasbihat items with Arabic text, translation, and counts.
frontend/src/features/weather/CompactWea: Shows a compact weather snippet based on stored location using useWeather.
frontend/src/features/weather/openMeteoW: Fetches current weather from Open-Meteo and maps weather codes to descriptions.
frontend/src/features/weather/useWeather: Custom React Query hook to fetch weather data for a given location.
frontend/src/features/weather/WeatherSec: Displays detailed weather info or prompts for location selection, using Open-Meteo data.
frontend/src/features/zikirmatik/Zikirma: Implements a digital tasbih counter with target setting and persistent storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity loading logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based theme variables and global styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/nativeNotifications.t: Provides helpers to send native Android notifications via a WebView bridge, with fallbacks and support checks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted or hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, container settings, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the Ramadan fasting checklist features, state versioning, and pending requests.
